column5: Cliffs balls finally made into my hands. They were all scratched and dirty but after a good wash, Cliff's balls came out nice and clean. Bite Me et al, thanks so much for watching and carrying Cliff's balls around until I was able to get them into my hands. Oh and heavy to boot.  Squid
I hope y'all washed your hands after
So there were 2 Peters with Big Cliffs balls?
Balls that big require 2 Peters
Just how big are they..............?
Yeah, we're having popcorn.
One wonders if Big Cliff's feeling the loss of his balls yet?  JF
Could I get a picture of Peter with the Balls?  Joey
Giving the shirt off your back is one thing, but Big Cliff's really taken it to a whole 'nother level.
I dont want to see anyones balls that have been manhandled that many times by different people.  Actually...I don't wanna see anyones else's balls.....
Ditto -
Did you want them in full size or shrunk down?
Mebbe she'd like to see 'em in action.  JF
Cliff, will Big Cliff's balls make the remix release of the OFC Anthem??
Hmmm....will have to think that one over....LOL.  Maybe I'll have to do another song...to the tune of AC/DCs "Big Balls" and work it in that way.
He's married, they haven't been used in years.
ROTFLMAO. Aint it the truth.
Hey. I've heard guys refer to the old ball and chain, but using her for a downrigger - sheesh!  JF
Wait a minute, if he's married, how'd Squid get them out of the vice?

You guys are just too funny  Glad to hear that they finally got to where they are going and will finally see some action again, it has been a while! Joey I'm sure squid will show them to you in person (or replicas) you don't need a picture.
Must be a catchy thing cause this band even wrote a song about them
I hope he at least cleans them off before he shows them to anyone. It's not yer fault any more if they're all rusty.  JF
